data.text:
We carry Austria in our ❤ and into the world!

Happy National Day, Austria! 🇦🇹
 
#Servus #AustrianNationalDay #CharmingAustria https://t.co/hdk2QnYaEY

¡Hola Cancún! 🇲🇽

12 hours after takeoff, OS95 landed safe and sound at @Cancun_Airport! Upon arrival, our Mexican colleagues and partners welcomed our crew and passengers with a wet refreshment!💦✈️

#ServusCancún #HolaMéxico #LovingTheWorld https://t.co/qnYlBqWgUq

¡A Cancún! 🇲🇽🌮

New adventures ahead: today we took off from Vienna to Cancún for the first time since 2006. Passengers on our fully booked maiden flight already started the fiesta with Mexican rhythms at the gate @flughafen_wien! 

#ServusCancún #NewAdventures #Bienvenidos https://t.co/q8qCFEiuLt

It’s a date! ❤️🗽
From 8 November, the US officially welcomes fully vaccinated EU-travelers again! We cannot wait for you to (re)discover the „land of opportunities“ with us! ✈️🇺🇸 

#ServusUSA #LovingTheWorld https://t.co/SY0N1n4AdR

data.text:
The ideal preparation for a football match starts with dancing a classic waltz up in the air, right? We had the pleasure to fly the @dfb_team to Skopje and back to Germany in “Austrian” style. Congratulations on the great performance! 🙌 🇩🇪 ⚽

#Servus #MKDGER #DieMannschaft https://t.co/q3LE4Z2lDP

data.text:
Nothing but blue skies for our first flight to #Montreal after 18 months!✈️🍁 

Starting today, our lovely crew will fly you three times a week to beautiful Québec on one of our #Boeing767 aircraft!

Bon voyage!🇨🇦
#ServusCanada #AustrianAirlines @AirCanada https://t.co/I2dYBP9A4S

Flying you around the world with our charming smiles since 1957 – and still no wrinkles! 🥰
Today, we are happy to celebrate our 64th anniversary! 🥳✈️🇦🇹 

#LovingTheWorld #Servus #AustrianAirlines https://t.co/qfhOfclKjE

We are adapting our #AIRail schedule with bagdrop possibility to our passengers’ demands. As of Friday, 1 Oct, you can test our service on an earlier daily connection from Salzburg (OS3546) & Linz (OS3504) to Vienna Airport!🧳🚆✈️
More info👉🏼https://t.co/YKA3kqvPBd

#ZugzumFlug https://t.co/zIdNOfEMyi

data.text:
Back in #Canada!🇨🇦 
On 1 October we will add #Montreal to our long-haul destinations again. In cooperation with @AirCanada, we will fly our passengers three times a week year-round to the largest French-speaking city in North America!✈️

👉https://t.co/EHRyhLFLqb

#ServusMontreal https://t.co/ll8Qm3OF27

From 15 September 2021, the wearing of FFP2-masks without a valve has become mandatory on all Austrian Airlines flights. Therefore, please make sure to bring your own FFP2-mask with you. 

Find further information here: https://t.co/elIKPrrIjD 

#Servus #AustrianAirlines #WeCare https://t.co/L93IjRen8E

data.text:
September is business travel month! 💼✈️
No more mute & frozen and back to meet & greet with our comprehensive route network with over 70 destinations in Europe for business travelers.

Find out more: https://t.co/Mj7dVxVXpT

#Servus #LovingTheWorld https://t.co/KDx38DqVJZ

urls.title: Book now and discover the most beautiful destinations
urls.description: Even in these times, we bring you safely to your desired destination. Whether on the ground or in the air: we always pay attention to hygiene and your health.

data.text:
The new destinations now bookable on https://t.co/Ot0LJCyXPb include Antalya, Catania, Ibiza, Palma de Mallorca, Keflavík, Mykonos as well as Málaga and Naples.

#Servus #AustrianAirlines

Next summer, Austrian Airlines will offer more scheduled flights to holiday destinations!☀️ 
Besides a better integration with the rest of the route network, travelers will benefit from all services available on scheduled flights. https://t.co/AtjyazOOQD

data.text:
What an exciting day! 🛫😎 Yesterday, our last #Tokyo2020-flight for the Austrian Paralympic Committee touched down in Vienna. We congratulate all Austrian athletes on their fantastic performance at the #ParalympicGames. 👏 🇦🇹

#Servus #Paralympics2020 https://t.co/KBLj2mV2B9

data.text:
What an exciting match against @FCZoryaOfficial and congratulations on winning, @skrapid! 🥳 Thank you for travelling with Austrian Airlines and we hope you had a pleasant stay on board. ⚽🛫

#Servus #AustrianAirlines #Rapid #SKRapid #SCR2021 #UEL https://t.co/otwoA4SqtW

We are keeping our fingers crossed for the upcoming match against FC Zorya Luhansk, @skrapid! ✊🏼 Our crew is happy to have you on board and make it a successful journey! ⚽🛫

#Servus #AustrianAirlines #Rapid
RT @unsereOEBB: Wir testen mit @_austrian die Gepäckaufgabe direkt im Railjet. So wird die „Zug zum Flug“-Anreise noch leichter. Das Pilotp…

#AustrianTeamSpirit never felt better! 🇦🇹💪🎖️

We are proud to fly two dozen athletes to the @Paralympics in #Tokyo. Our COO Francesco Sciortino took the opportunity for a personal farewell on the apron today! https://t.co/y9tFTRFTGX

🚆💼✈️…bringing your suitcase from platform to luggage belt in no-time! 
With the trial of our new bagdrop service on selected AIRail connections we now take passengers to our Vienna hub comfortably by train and directly out into the world by plane! 

👉 https://t.co/YKA3kqvPBd https://t.co/4TndNPNDi6

data.text:
A sweet start into vacation: Our guests on today‘s Boeing 777 flight to Heraklion were surprised by our CCO Michael Trestl and our team at Vienna Airport with breakfast croissants and goodies before boarding! 🥐✈️

#ServusCrete #Servus #NewAdventuresAhead https://t.co/K0VghgCWzx

data.text:
As Austrian home carrier, we are proud to be able to assist the federal government by flying urgently needed #COVID19 vaccines to #Tunisia. ✈️

#inthistogether #ÖsterreichImHerzen https://t.co/YdUFdTinZi

Thank you for waltzing back into the world with us! 💃🏽 Have a look at our compilation and learn more about our challenge here 👉🏻 https://t.co/okR7artu7a. #Servus #AustrianAirlines #WaltzBackIntoTheWorld #NewAdventuresAhead https://t.co/4RpBXAbcDs

Quite an occasion today for our „Dream of Freedom“ #Boeing777 & crew to fly our passengers from Vienna to Heraklion! 🇬🇷

Seven such special flights with our largest aircraft will be operated to Crete throughout summer to meet the high demand! ✈️🏖
#ServusCrete #WeAreAustrian https://t.co/oKWG8K2nxV

data.text: We are looking forward to flying you out on vacation. Currently, our service centers are in full operation. However, there will be waiting times and we ask for your understanding. More tips for your travel planning: https://t.co/fFhnXGGzkW https://t.co/oPFqoB2f3h

¡Buenos días desde Málaga! ☀️🇪🇸

As of today, we fly our passengers twice a week to sunny Andalusia all around the year. Thank you for the warm welcoming of our crew and passengers! 

#ServusMalaga #WeAreAustrian #MaidenFlight https://t.co/OQ268JiuMu

From today on, Austrian Airlines offers up to three flights daily to #Pristina ✈️🇽🇰. 
For the first time since the 21-year existence of our flight service to Pristina the route will be operated with such a high frequency! 

👉https://t.co/EpVhwliyS6 https://t.co/h0bWnpfKrV

data.text: The Viennese waltz is an inseparable part of @_austrian. As our boarding music, it has always stood for Austrian culture and our home country. With the pandemic, it fell silent. Hence, we feel great joy to reconnect 🇦🇹 with the world in 3/4 time again! 💃🏻 #WaltzBackIntoTheWorld https://t.co/x66YgaVq0M

Waltz back into the world with us - starting on 29 June 2021! 💃🏻 Find out more on our social media channels soon. Stay tuned! 🎶🛫 #WaltzBackIntoTheWorld #ÖsterreichImHerzen #LovingAustria https://t.co/lnZw1YFsJ3

domain.name: Soccer Match
domain.description: Sports Event specific to Soccer matches

data.text: Today it's all or nothing at Wembley! ⚽ The Austrian Team made it to the round of sixteen for the first time at a EURO and we are beyond excited! We wish our national team all the best for today's match against the great football nation Italy! 🎉 #EURO2020 #ITAAUT https://t.co/16oqjoIK1J

As of 22 July we will fly from Vienna to Málaga! The route will be served twice a week throughout the year. Apart from Málaga we are also offering other Spanish holiday destinations this summer. These include Barcelona, Ibiza, Palma de Mallorca, Gran Canaria and Tenerife. ❤️🇪🇸 ✈️ https://t.co/JhXhh0XsL4

The OE-LPA will now be the last aircraft to get its cabin seats back, which is done in the Austrian Airlines technical department at @flughafen_wien. From July, the aircraft will again operate regular passenger flights – to North America, among other destinations.

On 159 flights, we transported 4,500 tons of relief supplies to Europe in the fight against the pandemic. The cargo included 200 million protective masks, 30 million test kits and more than 15 million medical gloves. We flew the goods to Austria, but also to Germany and Italy.

data.text: After 15 months, we are ending our “Prachter” operation. Since March 2020, long-haul passenger aircraft have regularly operated as freighter-only between Asia and Europe. Two Boeing 777s registered OE-LPA and OE-LPC with removed passenger seats formed the operation's backbone. https://t.co/AF5aLt9164

data.text:
It's decision day! ⚽ We wish our national team all the best for the upcoming match against Ukraine and for a possible first time in the round of the last 16 at a EURO. 🇦🇹🇺🇦 

#EURO2020 https://t.co/kZJHZiJ0bQ

domain.name: Soccer Match
domain.description: Sports Event specific to Soccer matches

data.text:
Let the game begin! ⚽ We wish our national team all the best for the upcoming match against the Netherlands. May the best win! 🇳🇱🇦🇹

#Servus #AustrianAirlines #EURO2020 #MatchDay #NEDAUT https://t.co/RGP3F6DxaO

entity.name: Pride Month
entity.description: Page for Global Pride Month for all years

data.text:
For us, diversity is an integral part - no matter if high up in the air or on the ground. Happy Pride Month! 🏳️‍🌈

#Servus #ServusDiversity #AustrianAirlines #Diversity #Pride #PrideMonth #WeAreAustrian #WeArePride https://t.co/VlytHDgoF3
Welcome back on board, Mr President! Always an honor! 👋✈️ https://t.co/PauExqSGvF
Buongiorno Milano Linate! As of today we are back. 🛬👋 https://t.co/45uchCk9TU
That's it. One last landing for our Dash @flughafen_wien. Pfiat di, Dash! Thanks for 40 years of bringing people together 👏👋❤️ https://t.co/zabD61lPET
Perfect weather in Innsbruck today, making our lovely retro uniforms & our Dash shine! https://t.co/sOa5O3g2B1
Some of our most favorite flightdeck pictures from our last Dash passenger flight. Of course, it had to be Innsbruck! 😍 https://t.co/1JnSSM7iBn

It is the end of an impressive era. Today we operate our last passenger flight with a turboprop aircraft. The Dash 8-Q400 with the registration OE-LGI flies as OS 905/6 from Vienna to Innsbruck and back. After more than 40 years, this marks the end of the Dash's time in Austria. https://t.co/Ean4232Zbe

She did a great job in every aspect, although things were not always easy for her. But even great times come to an end at some time. That's why we say "Thank you" and "Pfiat' di". 🇦🇹❤

#WeAreAustrian #PfiatDi #Farewell https://t.co/18YLsrIq5u

With Austrian travel easings and a soon-to-be introduced EU-wide Covid certificate we expect travel within the EU to be as carefree as possible. For a restoration of global freedom of travel we call politics for an internationally recognized certificate: https://t.co/4rh6Zb2mKA https://t.co/OTYjAgwdhx
Passengers affected by a flight cancellation will be rebooked accordingly. All information about the flexible rebooking options with Austrian Airlines can be found here: https://t.co/Nfnf2Oixyl

data.text: Austrian Airlines flights to London Heathrow can still be operated, but we have to cancel all passenger flights from London to Vienna for this period and suspend the connection between Vienna and Manchester completely.

data.text: The Austrian federal government has once again imposed a landing ban on flights from the United Kingdom. This will initially apply from 1 to 20 June 2021 inclusive. https://t.co/pnGOBNTDfS

You want to book a flight but you still feel a little uncertain? In this case, take advantage of our flexible rebooking options until the end of July 2021 when booking your flights with Austrian Airlines! 🛫 For further information please click here: https://t.co/H82BBE57IF https://t.co/HMwwrbylgB
Find more information here: https://t.co/Siso6Ygb7I

Austria and many other European countries are easing their travel restrictions so we are ramping up our tourist offer for the summer. With around 30 destinations, the focus is on holiday spots in the Mediterranean region. Over 100 destinations worldwide will be on offer in total. https://t.co/LuOnEf0fed
Happy anniversary @staralliance! 🎂🍾 All the best wishes from Vienna! #MyStarAlliance https://t.co/H0oqAxShTi

data.text: RT @lufthansaNews: Lufthansa Group Airlines extend option to change reservations without a rebooking fee. All fares can still be rebooked f…

Your safety and health is our top priority! Therefore, our aircraft are equipped with special HEPA filters that guarantee the best air quality on board and an exchange of air every three minutes. Further, they remove 99,9% of all viruses, bacteria and other particles. https://t.co/ubBha3geiT

data.text:
Passengers traveling to 🇩🇪, 🇬🇷 or 🇪🇸 can now upload corona-related travel documents to have them checked before getting to the airport. This allows for more planning security and means less time spent at the airport. 
More info▶️ https://t.co/kwWTJXWRLX https://t.co/Pwxg0jm7XC

domain.name: Reoccurring Trends
domain.description: Twitter generated Trends that occur on a daily, weekly, monthly, or yearly basis such as Monday motivation.

data.text: Sunrise @flughafen_wien 🌅✈️. May you rise and shine with lots of #MondayMotivation as well! https://t.co/kezbWCaHnx

Today one year ago the last repatriation flight took place. From all over the world we took stranded passengers back home on behalf of @MFA_Austria. It was an honor to be of service! 🇦🇹🛬 https://t.co/izsrk7ivaK

In addition, the possibility remains to support climate protection projects, which Austrian Airlines offers in cooperation with Climate Austria. These include projects for the use of clean energy in Austria and Gold Standard projects in Africa that sustainably avoid CO2.

Our passengers can now select the use of sustainable fuel for their flight in the booking process. In doing so, they compensate for the CO2 emissions generated on their respective flight. The applied tool is called“Compensaid”, a development of @LHInnovationHub. https://t.co/CjCR2ZxaE0

We will fly to Zaporizhzhia three times a week from 17 May. An increase to a daily connection is planned in the course of the summer. This route announcement comes on a special day. On 1 April 1991, Austrian Airlines flew to Ukraine for the first time. The destination was Kyiv. https://t.co/nKeLKDwcuK

We just took off to our first flight to Tokyo since the beginning of the pandemic. This means a lot to us, as you can see from what our crew has put together on their own initiative. 🇯🇵❤️🇦🇹 https://t.co/t8TJ41lcoL
We wish our OE-LAX and its crew a pleasant last regular flight to Washington and back to Vienna. Thank you for more than 28 years of service! 👋#Servus https://t.co/8KEjmiREe4

CCO Michael Trestl: "People are longing for vacations. That's why we will be focusing on attractive long-haul destinations in the coming winter flight schedule. I am confident that by then many people will have been vaccinated so that traveling will once again be easier. https://t.co/X2hMH52Ffw

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

data.text: Mauritius will also be reintroduced after a break due to Corona. We will operate up to three flights a week to the sunny island in the Indian Ocean and will take off three times a week to the Maldives and twice a week to Cape Town.

data.text: We are already preparing ourselves for next winter with a comprehensive tourism offensive. From October 24, 2021, we will be taking off twice a week for Cancun in sunny Mexico. The last flight to this vacation destination was in 2006. #servus #welcometomexico https://t.co/Usi7ezXv50

data.text: The governmental landing ban on flights from the UK will cease on Sunday midnight. As a result, we will resume normal passenger flights from @HeathrowAirport to @flughafen_wien as of Monday, 22 March. Have a nice weekend everybody. 😉 https://t.co/UsKG4xI2UP

data.text: The @EU_Commission today presented plans for a digital, Europe-wide "Green Passport" by 1 June. It will document vaccinations, test results and overcome CoV infections. We expressly welcome this, as it represents a significant step towards restoring freedom of travel in Europe. https://t.co/SpGTmCjPby

The new catering concept is available on flights lasting up to three hours. Quality, regionality and selection are the focus of the new offering. Details of the new catering offer on European flights and the menu valid as of 18 March can be found at https://t.co/o5kRSz2get

data.text: Apple strudel, chicken schnitzel, chive bread or Brettljause - accompanied by a Melange, an apple juice "g'spritzt" or a glass of wine: as of 18 March, our Economy Class passengers on European flights can choose from a range of diverse, high-quality Austrian Melangerie products. https://t.co/Xm7Dls9hKt

Short on options? 🤔 Not with Austrian Airlines! ✈️ Look forward to more variety coming soon! Learn more starting March 12, 2021.

#Servus #AustrianMelangerie #InsideAustrian https://t.co/b5tYDbu9tv

Short on options? 🤔 Not with Austrian Airlines! ✈️ Look forward to more variety coming soon! Learn more starting March 12, 2021.

#Servus #AustrianMelangerie #InsideAustrian https://t.co/SBztPtueiB

The freshly produced food for the new catering concept on European flights of up to 180 minutes, the "Austrian Melangerie", also comes from DO & CO. Passengers will be able to choose from a selection of high-quality dishes from the exclusive DO & CO brand "Henry for Austrian".

As catering partner, DO & CO will continue to cater for the physical well-being of all Austrian Airlines passengers on flights over three hours, on long-haul flights from Vienna, on Austrian Holidays charter flights and in Business Class on European flights.

Austrian Airlines and DO & CO are continuing their successful partnership. The Austrian quality caterer has been on board with Austrian since 2007. The existing contract has now been extended prematurely until 2027. https://t.co/4iaf5ohDey

Short on options? 🤔 Not with Austrian Airlines! ✈️ Look forward to more variety coming soon! Learn more starting March 12, 2021.

#Servus #AustrianMelangerie #InsideAustrian https://t.co/QeNAVxS9EI

Short on options? 🤔 Not with Austrian Airlines! ✈️ Look forward to more variety coming soon! Learn more starting March 12, 2021.

#Servus #AustrianMelangerie #InsideAustrian https://t.co/7MjinNTd0I

data.text: In about ten minutes we will start our press conference concerning the annual results of 2020. Follow it live here on our twitter channel. The presentation will be held in German only. https://t.co/7zsvXQUQho

Our OE-LAT crew is sending greetings from a sunny ⁦@FlyBGR⁩. At 8 a.m. local time they will depart as OS 1413 to Pinal Airpark, Arizona. Follow their journey live ⁦@flightradar24⁩ ✈️ https://t.co/gQcBXyrsff

“A European-wide health pass will be the door opener for the 2021 summer season. This has to be a digital pass and internationally recognized. Of course, a unified worldwide solution would be even better”, says Austrian Airlines CEO @AHoensbroech.

Concerning the freedom of travel, we assume that a two-fold strategy consisting of vaccinations and testing will exist in any case for a while due to the slow vaccination rate. Many countries will specify negative test results or a vaccination certificate as the basis for entry.

The summer of 2021 will be decisive in determining the continuing existence of Austrian Airlines. “We are witnessing initial positive trends in bookings for this year’s holiday season and assume that catch-up effects could already be seen in summer", says CCO Michael Trestl.

The 79 percent pandemic-related decrease in the number of passengers to 3.1 million (14.6 million in 2019) abruptly halted the steep growth of passenger volume for the last years. The flight offering in available seat kilometers fell by 75 percent to 7.1 million.

The coronavirus crisis and the three-month standstill in flight operations have pushed our annual results for 2020 deep into the red. Today we report a loss of minus EUR 319 million in the coronavirus year. For comparison, in 2019 we had an adjusted EBIT of EUR 19 million.

Since delivery in 1991, the OE-LAT has completed over 19,000 landings and around 133,000 flight hours. This corresponds to over 15 years in the air. All of Austrian Airlines says thank you for all the years of service! Goodbye OE-LAT 🙏🛫❤️❤️❤️
